fulltext:
Tran Trong Binh
APPLY TO PERFORMANCE MANAGER
Objective
Take advantages of software skills & experience to help increase Productivity and Service
Quality.
 Education
HA NOI UNIVERSITY OF TECHNOLOGY
SEP 2000 - JUN 2005
Major: Engineering of Physics
GPA: 7.2/10
 08/14/1982
 Male
 0966.50.98.98
 ttrongbinh@gmail.com
Hanoi, Vietnam
Linkin: tran-trong-binh
Work Experience
TNT EXPRESS
OCT 2005 - JAN 2009
Warehouse controler and operation adminitrator
Main responsibilities:
- Control OPS material warehouse. Ensure OPS material ordered, distributed promptly,
sufficiently & economically to customers & OPS staff. 
- Check all Warehouse expense claims to ensure accuracy & sufficient attached
documentation as company regulations before transfer to FA.
- Analyze service performance promptly & accurately, with failures & root causes pointed out
& improvement solutions suggested.- Assist OPS Manager/Supervisor in reviewing linehaul &
setting up new linehaul when requested.
- Carry out & handover to PUD preprinted connote, invoice promptly & correctly.
- Monitor OPS systems to ensure smooth working. Incidents reported promptly to
IT/Helpdesk & followed up closely.
- Order & distribute OPS stationary promptly, sufficiently & economically to OPS staff.
TNT EXPRESS
JAN 2009 - JAN 2012
Import-Export Senior Executive
- Support the depot operations leadership development and succession planning
programmers by actively identifying the high potentials. 
- Ensure a strong focus on clearance competencies development and quality. 
- Conduct regular Quality Monitoring in line with the set process and together with results
from Service Quality Audits, incorporate findings and corrective actions into regular employee
coaching or actions leading to increased subcontractor performance. 
- Assist in the development and implementation of actions plans that address the outcomes
of Service Quality and Customer Loyalty Measurement Programmers. 
- Identify ongoing service issues and recommend solutions to relevant Ops Management. 
- Support and participate appropriate actions in the Operations and with cross-functional
colleagues, in order to improve customer retention and customer growth. 
SEFLEMPLOYEE
JAN 2012 - NOV 2017
Start-up Projects
Project 1: www.hssearch.net
- Hssearch.net is a thematic search engine developed for assisting importers/exporters to
easily learn the correct customs tariff classification for the goods they intend to import or
export.
Project 2: NODA Mobile Application
- A mobile application to connect Customers and Farmers to reduce cost and Transportation


SKILLS
Office
Logical thinking and creative
Public Speaking
INTERESTS
Football
Tennis
Table Tennis
time.
Project 3: www.cuocbien.com
- Like booking accommodation online, Cuocbien - allows customers to get prices online and
book shipments directly from the website. Cuocbien is a trusted community marketplace for
people to send goods around the world. The Cuocbien.com helps to arrange the international
cargo delivery from 1m³ or 50 kg till shiploads.
DHL ECOMMERCE
NOV 2017 - SEP2018
Operations Supervisor
- Lead a team of 7 employees and achieved targets meeting quality and standards
- Inspected goods and returned materials not meeting company's standards
- Communicated with cross functional department and met daily production target
- Endures product quality and customer satisfaction are met and adhered to state and federal
regulations
- Kept track of inventory and assisting in physical inventories
Highest performance:
- Rebuild Return parcels SOPs by Macro Excel that help to increase productivity from 100
Parcels/hours to 300 Parcels/hour. 
- A tool helping print label more quickly. From 15 Seconds to 4 Seconds/Parcel.
- A excel tool that automatically prevent DG items for Air transport base one Description of
good.
- ...
LAZADA EXPRESS
SEP 2018 - PRESENT
Performance Supervisor
- Lead a team of 2 employees and achieved targets meeting quality and standards
- Communicated with cross functional department and met daily, weekly, monthly 
performance target
- Endures product quality and customer satisfaction are met and adhered to state and federal
regulations
Highest performance:
- Building company performance reports by using Microsoft Power BI. 
- Building tools helping cross function aware issues.
- ...

MS Access 2007/2007/Xp

Start-up Projects Project 1: www.hssearch.net
- Hssearch.net is a thematic search engine developed for assisting importers/exporters to easily learn the correct customs tariff classification for the goods they intend to import or export.
Project 2: NODA Mobile Application - A mobile application to connect Customers and Farmers to reduce cost and Transportation time.
Project 3: www.cuocbien.com
- Like booking accommodation online, Cuocbien - allows customers to get prices online and book shipments directly from the website. Cuocbien is a trusted community marketplace for people to send goods around the world. The Cuocbien.com helps to arrange the international cargo delivery from 1m3 or 50 kg till shiploads.
